Viewing References

Because folders and items can be shared manually and because views may be children of other views, a folder or item can be associated with more than one project, view, or parent folder within the same server configuration. Each instance of the folder or item has a reference to its tip revision.

To view folder references, you must open a separate dialog. To view item references, you use the project view window and the Reference tab on the lower pane.

To view folder references:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Select Advanced > References from the Folder or context menu. The Folder References dialog displays a tree showing the project views that reference this folder and their relationship to each other.

To view item references:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click a component tab.

  3. Select an item from the upper pane.

  4. Click the Reference tab on the lower pane. The Reference pane displays a tree showing the project views that reference this item and their relationship to each other.

To view references for past revisions of a folder:

  1. Select a folder from the StarTeam folder hierarchy.

  2. Select Properties from the Folder or context menu. This action displays the Folder Properties dialog.

  3. Click the History tab.

  4. Select a revision in the History list, and right-click to display the History context menu.

  5. Click the References tab. The Folder References dialog displays a tree showing the project views that referenced past revisions of this folder and their relationship to each other. The references are the same for a historical or tip revision; however, whether the references are in boldface type will vary.

To view references for past revisions of an item:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click a component tab.

  3. Select an item from the upper pane.

  4. Click the History tab on the lower pane.

  5. Right-click an item revision to display the History context menu.

  6. Select References. The References dialog displays a tree showing the project views that referenced past revisions of this item and their relationship to each other. The references are the same for a historical or tip revision; however, whether the references are in boldface type will vary.
